# Step 1: Read the already-pivoted extract and inspect it

SRC_PATH = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/LLAttr/Case_Dates_95499/"

case_dates_raw = (
    spark.read.format("csv")
    .option("header", "true")
    .option("multiLine", "true")
    .option("quote", "\"")
    .option("escape", "\"")
    .option("mode", "PERMISSIVE")
    .load(SRC_PATH)
)

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

# --- rename map (no attr_ prefix) ---
rename_map = {
  "ID": "legacyCaseId",
  "1":  "legacyIdField",
  "2":  "receiptDate",
  "3":  "startDate",
  "4":  "appealValidDate",
  "5":  "callInDate",
  "6":  "receivedFromCallInAuthorityDate",
  "7":  "targetDate",
  "8":  "bespokeTargetDate",
  "9":  "dateRecovered",
  "10": "notRecoveredOrDerecoveredDate",
  "11": "sentToDecisionBranchDate",
  "12": "noticeWithdrawnDate",
  "13": "appealWithdrawnDate",
  "14": "caseDecisionDate",
  "16": "appealTurnedAwayDate",
  "17": "appealLapsedDate",
  "18": "caseClosedDate",
  "19": "procedureDeterminedDate",
  "20": "originalCaseDecisionDate",
  "21": "planningGuaranteeDate",
  "23": "decisionOrReportReceivedInPinsDate",
  "24": "sentToReaderDate",
  "25": "returnedFromReaderDate",
  "26": "publicationProcedureCompletedDate",
  "27": "costsReportDespatchedDate",
  "28": "orderRejectedOrReturnedDate",
  "29": "validityStatusDate",
}

df2 = case_dates_raw.select([F.col(c).alias(rename_map.get(c, c)) for c in case_dates_raw.columns])

clean_exprs = [F.col("legacyCaseId")]
for c in [c for c in df2.columns if c != "legacyCaseId"]:
    clean_exprs.append(
        F.when(
            F.col(c).isNull() |
            (F.trim(F.col(c)) == "") |
            (F.lower(F.trim(F.col(c))) == "undefined"),
            F.lit(None)
        ).otherwise(F.col(c)).alias(c)
    )

df2 = df2.select(*clean_exprs)

undefined_counts = {
    c: df2.filter(F.lower(F.trim(F.col(c))) == "undefined").count()
    for c in df2.columns if c != "legacyCaseId"
}

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

case_dates_target = (
    df3.select(
        F.col("legacyCaseId"),
        # Target model fields we can map now:
        F.col("startDate").alias("startDate"),
        F.coalesce(F.col("bespokeTargetDate"), F.col("targetDate")).alias("targetDecisionDate"),
        
        # Fields not mapped yet (leave null for now)
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("expectedSubmissionDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("consentDeadlineDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("ogdDueDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("proposalLetterDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("expiryDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("partiesDecisionNotificationDeadlineDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("caseOfficerVerificationDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("proposedModificationsDate"),
        F.lit(None).cast("timestamp").alias("objectionPeriodEndsDate"),
    )
)

case_dates_target.printSchema()
display(case_dates_target.limit(50))

from pyspark.sql import functions as F

CASES_MAP_PATH = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/config/Cases/Cases.csv"

cases_map = (
    spark.read.format("csv")
    .option("header", "true")
    .load(CASES_MAP_PATH)
    .select(
        F.col("Case ID").cast("string").alias("legacyCaseId"),
        F.col("GUID").alias("caseId")
    )
    .dropna(subset=["legacyCaseId", "caseId"])
    .dropDuplicates(["legacyCaseId"])
)

joined = case_dates_target.join(cases_map, on="legacyCaseId", how="left")

# deterministic "guid-like" id derived from caseId (stable on reruns)
# md5 -> 32 hex chars, format as 8-4-4-4-12
joined = joined.withColumn("id_hex", F.md5(F.lower(F.col("caseId"))))
joined = joined.withColumn(
    "id",
    F.concat_ws(
        "-",
        F.substring("id_hex", 1, 8),
        F.substring("id_hex", 9, 4),
        F.substring("id_hex", 13, 4),
        F.substring("id_hex", 17, 4),
        F.substring("id_hex", 21, 12),
    )
).drop("id_hex")

case_dates_ready = joined.filter(F.col("caseId").isNotNull())

print("rows total:", joined.count())
print("rows with caseId:", case_dates_ready.count())

display(case_dates_ready.select("id","caseId","legacyCaseId","startDate","targetDecisionDate").limit(50))

final_df = case_dates_ready.select(
    "id",
    "startDate",
    "expectedSubmissionDate",
    "consentDeadlineDate",
    "ogdDueDate",
    "proposalLetterDate",
    "expiryDate",
    "partiesDecisionNotificationDeadlineDate",
    "targetDecisionDate",
    "caseOfficerVerificationDate",
    "proposedModificationsDate",
    "objectionPeriodEndsDate",
    "caseId"
)

print("Final row count:", final_df.count())
display(final_df)
